pandas==1.3.3
numpy==1.21.2

# Visualization libraries
matplotlib==3.4.3
seaborn==0.11.2

# Web scraping and API calls
requests==2.26.0
beautifulsoup4==4.10.0
Quandl==3.6.1

# Machine Learning and Stats
scikit-learn==0.24.2
statsmodels==0.12.2

# Natural Language Processing
nltk==3.6.2
gensim==4.1.2

# Jupyter Notebook for interactive development
jupyter==1.0.0

# Cloud and database access (specify versions if required)
boto3  # For AWS S3 and other AWS services
psycopg2-binary  # For PostgreSQL, which is used by Redshift
google-cloud-bigquery  # For GCP BigQuery
pyspark==3.1.2  # For Spark-based operations
databricks-cli  # CLI for Databricks operations
simple-salesforce  # For Salesforce operations
